It sounds like you're in the mood for some festive films! If you enjoy heartwarming stories, I'd highly recommend "It's a Wonderful Life" from 1946. This timeless classic stars Jimmy Stewart as George Bailey, who receives a miraculous visit from an angel that shows him what life would be like if he never existed.

Alternatively, if you're looking for something a bit lighter and fun, "Christmas with the Kranks" (2004) might tickle your fancy. This comedy stars Jamie Lee Curtis and Tim Allen as a couple who decide to skip Christmas, but end up having to organize one at the last minute when their daughter decides to come home!

I'd highly recommend "Frozen" for you! This animated adventure features a strong-willed heroine named Anna, who embarks on an epic journey with some colorful companions to save her kingdom from eternal winter. The movie boasts a talented voice cast including Josh Gad and Idina Menzel.

If you're in the mood for something more action-packed, "Die Hard 2" might be right up your alley. It's a thrilling sequel where Bruce Willis once again plays John McClane, battling rogue military operatives who have seized control of an airport during a Christmas Eve storm. Enjoy!
